name: Dior Forever Foundation
description: A long-wear, high-perfection foundation that enhances your natural glow.
ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides
usageInstructions: Apply with a brush or sponge for even coverage, blend well.

name: Chanel Les Beiges Blush
description: Soft rosy blush that gives a healthy radiance with every sweep.
ingredients: Talc, Silica, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Red 7 Lake
usageInstructions: Sweep onto cheeks with a blush brush, build as needed.

name: YSL Touche Éclat Concealer
description: Brightening pen that instantly highlights and conceals imperfections.
ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Iron Oxides, Vitamin E
usageInstructions: Apply to dark circles or blemishes, blend with fingertips.

name: Lancôme Hypnôse Mascara
description: Buildable volume mascara for custom lash intensity and elegance.
usageInstructions: Apply from root to tip, layer for more volume.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Eyeshadow Palette
description: Luxury palette with silky shades that blend effortlessly for any look.
ingredients: Talc, Mica, Silica, Iron Oxides, Carmine
usageInstructions: Apply with a brush, blend shades for a custom look.

name: Fenty Beauty Flyliner
description: Water-resistant eyeliner for sharp, precise, and bold lines.
usageInstructions: Draw along lash line for precise application.

name: Dior Addict Lip Glow
description: Iconic lip balm that enhances natural color with glossy glow.
ingredients: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Shea Butter, Cherry Extract
usageInstructions: Apply directly to lips for hydration and color.

name: YSL Rouge Pur Couture Lipstick
description: High-pigment lipstick delivering luxurious color and comfort.
usageInstructions: Apply evenly to lips, reapply as needed.

name: Rare Beauty Lip Soufflé Tint
description: Airy tint that glides softly for a velvety-matte finish.
usageInstructions: Swipe onto lips, blend for a natural finish.

name: NARS Radiant Creamy Concealer
description: Award-winning concealer that brightens and hides dark circles.
ingredients: Water, Dimethicone, Titanium Dioxide, Vitamin C
usageInstructions: Apply to imperfections, blend with a sponge.
